body_html: There is now a set of methods in tf.train that allow conditional enqueue. E.g. tf.train.maybe_batch. the conditional may be a boolean Tensor. This is probably the appropriate solution from now on.
body_text: There is now a set of methods in tf.train that allow conditional enqueue.  E.g. tf.train.maybe_batch.  the conditional may be a boolean Tensor. This is probably the appropriate solution from now on.
body: There is now a set of methods in tf.train that allow conditional enqueue.  E.g. tf.train.maybe_batch.  the conditional may be a boolean Tensor. This is probably the appropriate solution from now on.
